name: Gaming Shop Tycoon  - Idle Shopkeeper Tycoon Game
name_original: Gaming Shop Tycoon  - Idle Shopkeeper Tycoon Game
description:
Ready to be rich?

Become the richest idle shop tycoon entrepreneur!

Build your own idle tycoon business, earn money, and become the best idle gaming shop in the world of tycoon!

Sell computers, processors, graphics cards and much more. Let the esport customers fill their shopping carts!

Level up for new features to improve the quality of your products and unlock new products. Make your business grow!

Become the best idle tycoon supermarket manager.

Develop different marketing strategies to attract potential and existing esport customers. Their opinion and feedback is critical to run a profitable business. Buy new stuff to increase popularity of your esport gaming shop. Happy customers are returning customers! People needs computer parts for pc creator, esport or for their gamer studio.

In this game you will not learn how to bouild your computer but you can sell these parts for esport gamers, game dev companies, shop offline or just sell computer parts as idle shopkeeper gaming shop.

If you like idle and tapping games or if you like building tycoon games, you will enjoy this casual gaming shop tycoon game. Idle Gaming Shop Tycoon is an easy-to-play game where you run your own business with different product departments. Make important management decisions to build your idle tycoon empire and transform your small supermarket into one of the greatest in the world of tycoon games!
